citations.narrative:
Sharp points -
****
A chain link divider panel in between two enclosures, affecting 4 dogs, had at least 2 areas where there are bent
and/or twisted wires which have created sharp points. These sharp points were at dogs level and could cause
injury to the dogs. The licensee must repair/replace this section and ensure that all enclosures are free of sharp
points or edges that may injure the dogs at all times.
To be corrected by: 23 Apr 14
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensee.

narrative:
3.1(c)(1)(2)
HOUSING FACILITIES, GENERAL.
Sharp points - 
****
A chain link divider panel in between two enclosures, affecting 4 dogs, had at least 2 areas where there are bent
and/or twisted wires which have created sharp points.  These sharp points were at dogs level and could cause
injury to the dogs.  The licensee must repair/replace this section and ensure that all enclosures are free of sharp
points or edges that may injure the dogs at all times.  
To be corrected by:  23 Apr 14
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensee.
